name: react-ror-fullstack
description: Full-stack React + Ruby on Rails application

scripts.rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.frontend:install: docker compose exec frontend pnpm add
scripts.frontend:install-dev: docker compose exec frontend pnpm add -D
scripts.frontend:reinstall: docker compose exec frontend pnpm install
